welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded successfully! You might need to refresh to see all changes.
login.descDefault: Log in to continue to Kratia Forums.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: Please verify your email address ({{email}}) before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification link.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found in our records after authentication.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue accessing your user profile.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: Problem accessing your profile after Google Sign-In. Reason: {{reason}}.
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with this email address using a different sign-in method.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
signup.title: Apply to Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Become a member of our self-regulated community.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself and why you want to join (min. 50 characters). This will be part of your admission request.
signup.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account or pending application?
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Your presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger one.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Please fill out your presentation before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: Please agree to the Terms and Conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.error.googleSignupFailed: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.
signup.error.userSanctioned: User {{username}} is currently sanctioned and cannot re-apply at this time.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected issue occurred with Google Sign-Up.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with this email. Please log in or use a different Google account.
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: A verification email has been sent to your address.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please write your presentation before using Google Sign-Up.
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: Please agree to the Terms and Conditions.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: This email is already associated with an account. Try logging in.
forgotPassword.descDefault: No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: If an account exists for {{email}}, you will receive a password reset link. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
forgotPassword.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: A password reset link has been sent to {{email}} if an account exists.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verify Your Email
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.toComp: to complete your admission request to the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation
confirmPage.default.description: Please check the status or proceed as instructed.
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.
adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
adminPanel.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to access the Admin Panel.
adminPanel.error.fetchData: Failed to fetch administrative data. Please try again.
adminPanel.userManagement.title: User Management
adminPanel.categoryManagement.title: Category Management
adminPanel.categoryManagement.table.name: Name
adminPanel.forumManagement.title: Forum Management
adminPanel.forumManagement.table.name: Name
adminPanel.toast.errorDeletingForumDesc: Could not delete the forum. Please try again.
adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.title: Are you sure?
adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the forum "{{forumName}}"?
This action cannot be undone. Threads and posts within this forum will remain but become orphaned.
adminCreateCategory.title: Create New Category
adminCreateCategory.description: Add a new category to organize forums.
adminCreateCategory.descriptionPlacehold: A brief description of this category.
adminCreateCategory.toast.errorDesc: Could not create the category. Please try again.
adminCreateCategory.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to create categories.
adminEditCategory.title: Edit Category: {{categoryName}}
adminEditCategory.description: Modify the details of this category.
adminEditCategory.toast.errorDesc: Could not update the category. Please try again.
adminEditCategory.error.genericNotFound: The category you are trying to edit does not exist.
adminEditCategory.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit categories.
adminCreateForum.title: Create New Forum
adminCreateForum.description: Add a new forum under an existing category.
adminCreateForum.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of this forum's purpose.
adminCreateForum.isAgoraTooltip: The 'Agora' status is typically managed by system configuration and should not be changed here.
adminCreateForum.toast.errorDesc: Could not create the forum. Please try again.
adminCreateForum.error.noCategories: No categories available. Please create a category first.
adminCreateForum.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to create forums.
adminEditForum.title: Edit Forum: {{forumName}}
adminEditForum.description: Modify the details of this forum.
adminEditForum.isAgoraTooltip: The 'Agora' status is special and cannot be changed here.
adminEditForum.toast.errorDesc: Could not update the forum. Please try again.
adminEditForum.error.loadFail: Failed to load forum or category data.
adminEditForum.error.genericNotFound: The forum you are trying to edit does not exist.
adminEditForum.error.noCategories: No categories available. Cannot edit forum without categories.
adminEditForum.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit forums.
adminEditUser.title: Edit User: {{username}}
adminEditUser.emailChangeNote: Changing email here doesn't update Firebase Auth email.
adminEditUser.aboutMePlaceholder: A brief description about the user.
adminEditUser.adminActionAlertDesc: Changes made here directly affect the user's status and permissions. Use with caution.
adminEditUser.toast.successDesc: User {{username}}'s profile has been successfully updated.
adminEditUser.toast.errorDesc: Could not update the user. Please try again.
adminEditUser.toast.founderCannotChangeO: Founders cannot change their own role.
adminEditUser.error.missingId: User ID is missing from URL.
adminEditUser.error.genericNotFound: The user you are trying to edit does not exist.
adminEditUser.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit user profiles.
profileView.title: {{username}}'s Profile
profileView.status.underSanctionDesc: This user is currently undergoing a community sanction votation process. Some actions might be restricted.
profileView.recentActivity.title: Recent Activity
profileView.recentActivity.noThreads: No recent threads started by this user.
profileView.recentActivity.noPosts: No recent posts by this user.
profileView.error.missingId: User ID is missing from the URL.
profileView.error.userNotFound: User not found. This profile does not exist or could not be loaded.
profileView.error.loadFail: Failed to load user profile or activity. Please try again later.
profileView.error.genericNotFound: The user profile you are looking for could not be displayed.
profileEdit.title: Edit Your Profile
profileEdit.description: Update your personal information. This information will be visible to other users.
profileEdit.usernameHelpText: Changing your username might not update it in old posts immediately.
profileEdit.emailHelpText: Email address cannot be changed here.
profileEdit.aboutMePlaceholder: Tell us a little about yourself...
profileEdit.error.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to edit your profile.
profileEdit.error.profileNotFound: Your user profile could not be found.
profileEdit.error.loadFail: Failed to load your profile data. Please try again.
profileEdit.error.userNotFoundOnSubmit: User not found. Cannot save changes.
profileEdit.error.storageUnauthorized: Storage Error: You are not authorized to upload this file.
profileEdit.error.storageObjectNotFound: Storage Error: File not found after upload.
profileEdit.error.storageCanceled: Storage Error: The upload was canceled.
profileEdit.error.permissionDenied: Permission Denied: Could not save changes. Check Firestore/Storage rules.
profileEdit.error.cannotEditDesc: You might not have permission or your profile data could not be loaded.
profileEdit.toast.avatar.tooLargeDesc: Please select an image smaller than 5MB.
profileEdit.toast.avatar.invalidTypeDesc: Please select a JPG, PNG, GIF, or WEBP image.
profileEdit.toast.profileUpdateSuccessDe: Your profile has been successfully updated.
profileEdit.toast.profileUpdateErrorDesc: Could not update your profile. Please try again.
